member.summary: Adds a command to the collection and signs up for the event of it.

member.param: The command to register.

member.summary: Removes a command from the collection and removes itself from the event of it.
member.param: The command to unregister.

member.returns: if all of the commands return ; otherwise, .

member.summary: Evaluates if a command should execute.
member.param: The command to evaluate.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the command should be used when evaluating and .

member.name: P:Prism.Commands.CompositeCommand.RegisteredCommands
member.summary: Gets the list of all the registered commands.
member.remarks: This returns a copy of the commands subscribed to the CompositeCommand.

member.name: M:Prism.Events.EventSubscription.GetExecutionStrategy
member.summary: Gets the execution strategy to publish this event.
member.returns: An with the execution strategy, or if the is no longer valid.
member.remarks: If is no longer valid because it was garbage collected, this method will return . Otherwise it will return a delegate that evaluates the and if it returns will then call . The returned delegate holds a hard reference to the target delegates. As long as the returned delegate is not garbage collected, the references delegates won't get collected either.

member.summary: Defines a class that manages publication and subscription to events.

member.name: M:Prism.Events.PubSubEvent.Subscribe(System.Action)
member.summary: Subscribes a delegate to an event that will be published on the . will maintain a to the target of the supplied delegate.
member.param: The delegate that gets executed when the event is published.
member.returns: A that uniquely identifies the added subscription.

member.name: M:Prism.Events.PubSubEvent.Subscribe(System.Action,Prism.Events.ThreadOption)
member.summary: Subscribes a delegate to an event. PubSubEvent will maintain a to the Target of the supplied delegate.
member.param: The delegate that gets executed when the event is raised.
Specifies on which thread to receive the delegate callback.
member.returns: A that uniquely identifies the added subscription.

member.name: M:Prism.Events.PubSubEvent.Subscribe(System.Action,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Subscribes a delegate to an event that will be published on the .
member.param: The delegate that gets executed when the event is published.
When , the keeps a reference to the subscriber so it does not get garbage collected.
member.returns: A that uniquely identifies the added subscription.
member.remarks:
If is set to , will maintain a to the Target of the supplied delegate. If not using a WeakReference ( is ), the user must explicitly call Unsubscribe for the event when disposing the subscriber in order to avoid memory leaks or unexpected behavior.
The PubSubEvent collection is thread-safe.

The PubSubEvent collection is thread-safe.

member.name: T:Prism.Mvvm.ViewModelLocationProvider
member.summary: The ViewModelLocationProvider class locates the view model for the view that has the AutoWireViewModelChanged attached property set to true. The view model will be located and injected into the view's DataContext. To locate the view, two strategies are used: First the ViewModelLocationProvider will look to see if there is a view model factory registered for that view, if not it will try to infer the view model using a convention based approach. This class also provide methods for registering the view model factories, and also to override the default view model factory and the default view type to view model type resolver.

member.name: F:Prism.Mvvm.ViewModelLocationProvider._factories
member.summary: A dictionary that contains all the registered factories for the views.

member.name: F:Prism.Mvvm.ViewModelLocationProvider._typeFactories
member.summary: A dictionary that contains all the registered ViewModel types for the views.

member.name: F:Prism.Mvvm.ViewModelLocationProvider._defaultViewModelFactory
member.summary: The default view model factory which provides the ViewModel type as a parameter.

member.name: F:Prism.Mvvm.ViewModelLocationProvider._defaultViewModelFactoryWithViewParameter
member.summary: ViewModelfactory that provides the View instance and ViewModel type as parameters.

member.name: F:Prism.Mvvm.ViewModelLocationProvider._defaultViewTypeToViewModelTypeResolver
member.summary: Default view type to view model type resolver, assumes the view model is in same assembly as the view type, but in the "ViewModels" namespace.

member.summary: Sets the default view model factory.
member.param: The view model factory which provides the ViewModel type as a parameter.

member.param: The view type to view model type resolver.

member.name: M:Prism.Mvvm.ViewModelLocationProvider.AutoWireViewModelChanged(System.Object,System.Action{System.Object,System.Object})
member.summary: Automatically looks up the viewmodel that corresponds to the current view, using two strategies: It first looks to see if there is a mapping registered for that view, if not it will fallback to the convention based approach.
member.param: The dependency object, typically a view.
The call back to use to create the binding between the View and ViewModel

member.param: The view that the view model wants.
member.returns: The ViewModel that corresponds to the view passed as a parameter.

member.summary: Gets the ViewModel type for the specified view.
member.param: The View that the ViewModel wants.
member.returns: The ViewModel type that corresponds to the View.
